dt-api.name: row().deselect()

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the deselected row.
type.description: Deselect a single row in the table, based on the row found by the `dt-api row()` method.

dt-api.description: This method simply deselects a single row that has been found by the `dt-api row()` selector method.

example.title: Deselect the first row in the table's current page
